simulator.payloads
Class ReadablePayload

java.lang.Object
  simulator.payloads.ReadablePayload
Direct Known Subclasses:
CanMailbox.ReadableCanMailbox, PhysicalPayload.PhysicalReadablePayload
public abstract class ReadablePayload
extends java.lang.Object

Tag class for payloads that provides a read-only wrapper for payload classes. Any class that extends this class should methods for reading state from whatever payload class they contain. Utility superclasses can extend the ReadablePayload to make a more specific (but still abstract) readable wrapper. See PhysicalReadablePayload in PhysicalPayload for an example.

(package private)  Payload asPayload()
          This method that lets the network scheduler get the real payload class internally.
abstract  void deliverTo(Networkable networkable)
          This class is implemented by each readable payload so that the call to Networkable.receive() will take place within the Readable class and result in delivery to the correct receive method.

deliverTo

public abstract void deliverTo(Networkable networkable)
This class is implemented by each readable payload so that the call to Networkable.receive() will take place within the Readable class and result in delivery to the correct receive method.

Parameters:
networkable - the object to deliver the message to.
